title: Got a free chest and key out of a chest, apparently, but they're nowhere to be found.
body:
To start with, I bought two chests and two keys. That plus the one key I had sitting around from earlier makes 2 boxes and 3 keys. _(If you're wondering why I bought two keys when I already have one, I don't know. I just wanted to get the RP counter to zero, but in hindsight I should've bought a third chest instead...)_

Anyways, I went to the crafting menu and hit the button that said "Open 2" boxes.

The first box contained, in order; Commando J4 shard -> chest -> emote -> key.

The second had just an Order of the Lotus Karma shard.

After that, I'm left with 0 chests and 1 key, like what I began with, so where did the alleged free chest and key disappear to?

replies.body:
Hey there, I looked into this for you and do see quite a bit of goodies but no missing chests.  

Your 2 chests opened Comando Jarvan IV skin shard, Vamporo Emote (awesome!), and a chest within a chest.  This was the combined content of your two chests.

This third chest gave a skin shard for Order of the Lotus Karma.

Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AucWHacY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-17T23:46:27.779+0000)
>
> Hey there, I looked into this for you and do see quite a bit of goodies but no missing chests.  
> 
> Your 2 chests opened Comando Jarvan IV skin shard, Vamporo Emote (awesome!), and a chest within a chest.  This was the combined content of your two chests.
> 
> This third chest gave a skin shard for Order of the Lotus Karma.
> 
> Let me know if that clears things up!

Oh, so the second chest was automatically opened as part of the pool it came from, then. Thanks for clearing that up.

I'm not sure what the point of it displaying a chest and key as loot is if said chest and key are just automatically opened anyway, though.
